text: Victor Lanoux (18 June 1936 - 4 May 2017) was a French actor. He was best known to English speaking audiences for his role as Ludovic in Cousin, Cousine. In 1961, Lanoux met Pierre Richard who was looking for someone to partner his cabaret act. They worked together for a number of years, including a season at the Bobino and a tour of Le Gorille. Lanoux died in Royan, France on 4 May 2017 from complications of a stroke at the age of 80.Victor Lanoux, célèbre pour son rôle dans « Louis la brocante », est mort ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Paris
title: Victor Lanoux
